class biometrics_tracker.output.reports.ReportBase(queue_mgr: Queues, person: Person, start_date: date, end_date: date)ÔÉÅ

Bases: Thread

A base class for classes that produce reports from the Biometrics Tracking database

run() → NoneÔÉÅ

Method representing the thread‚Äôs activity.

You may override this method in a subclass. The standard run() method invokes the callable object passed to the object‚Äôs constructor as the target argument, if any, with sequential and keyword arguments taken from the args and kwargs arguments, respectively.
